message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable.
Your turn, Alice. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?  Time is money, you know.
I'm willing to negotiate, Bob, but your last offer was a bit too greedy. This is my counter-offer.
Alice, let's be real, the clock is ticking. A 50/50 split is the most logical solution here. Don't let greed hurt us both.
